settings.description:
Founded in 2012 by Joseph Haddad in Brunswick, Melbourne, Code Black Coffee has quickly become a leader in the specialty coffee scene. Renowned for their precision, innovation, and commitment to quality, Code Black has built a reputation for pushing the boundaries of what great coffee can be.

At the heart of their mission is a relentless pursuit of excellence, from sourcing rare single origin beans to meticulous quality control, and a deep respect for every step of the coffee journey, from producer to cup.

The teamâ€™s dedication has earned them wide industry recognition, including the 2023, 2024, and 2025 Australian Brewers Cup titles, as well as the 2025 Australian Roasting Champion award.

What started as a single roastery has grown into seven locations across Melbourne, with Code Black Coffee earning widespread recognition for its expertise in roasting and its high-quality products. Today, theyâ€™re not only a favorite among coffee enthusiasts but also regarded as one of Australiaâ€™s foremost specialty coffee roasters.
